eu.h2020.helios_social.core.contextualegonetwork

Class Utils

  • java.lang.Object
    • eu.h2020.helios_social.core.contextualegonetwork.Utils

  • public class Utils
extends java.lang.Object
    This class implements static error parsing and logging methods, with the ability to suppress errors that can be silently handled during deployment.
    Author:
    Emmanouil Krasanakis (maniospas@iti.gr), Barbara Guidi (guidi@di.unipi.it), Andrea Michienzi (andrea.michienzi@di.unipi.it)

      If development is enabled, throws the given Throwable, otherwise logs its message.
      static <ExceptionType extends java.lang.Throwable,ValueType>
      ValueType      		 error(ExceptionType exception, ValueType defaultValue)
      If development is enabled, throws the given Throwable, otherwise logs its message and returns the given default value.

        Throws:
        ExceptionType - The given exception if Utils.development is set to true
        java.lang.RuntimeException

      • log

        public static void log(java.lang.Object... messages)
        Logs the given objects by calling their Object.toString() values.
        Parameters:
        messages - Comma separated objects to write in one line of the log file

      • error

        public static void error(java.lang.String message)
                  throws java.lang.RuntimeException
        If development is enabled, throws an Exception with the given message, otherwise logs that message.
        Parameters:
        message - the message of the raised Exception
        Throws:
        java.lang.RuntimeException - The given exception if Utils.development is set to true

      • error

        public static <ExceptionType extends java.lang.Throwable,ValueType> ValueType error(ExceptionType exception,
                                                                                    ValueType defaultValue)
                                                                             throws java.lang.RuntimeException
        If development is enabled, throws the given Throwable, otherwise logs its message and returns the given default value.
        Parameters:
        exception - The exception to potentially throw
        defaultValue - The default value to return if an exception is not thrown
        Returns:
        The given defaultValue
        Throws:
        ExceptionType - The given exception if Utils.development is set to true
        java.lang.RuntimeException
